Body:
"""Ensure plots are updated before properties are used"""
if not isinstance(figures, list):
    figures = [[figures]]
_gui = GUI()
orig_val = _gui.busy
_gui.set_busy(busy=True)
_gui.process_events()
for ff in figures:
    for f in ff:
        f.render()
        mlab.draw(figure=f)
_gui.set_busy(busy=orig_val)
_gui.process_events()
